station module

class station.Station(stat_id)[source]

Bases: Vertex

Class representing a station. It inherits all properties from Vertex class.

Attributes

stat_idstr

unique ID of station

packages_timelist

list of instances of Package that will be available on station, sorted non-decreasingly by time of availability

available_packageslist

list of instances of Package that are currently available on station, sorted non-decreasingly by time of availability by nature of how it is created

distancesdict

dictionary of all instances of Station in network and their distance from this Station

Methods

add_package(package)[source]

Adds instance of Package to packages_time attribute and instantly sorts non-decreasingly by time

Parameters

packagePackage

instance of Package to be added

distance_to(stat_id)[source]

Returns distance to other Station of given ID

Parameters

stat_idstr

ID of Station

has_available_packages()[source]

Checks whether Station has any packages in available_packages, returns bool

is_empty()[source]

Checks whether Station has any packages in packages_time or available_packages, returns bool

reset_packages()[source]

Puts all packages from available_packages back to packages_time and then sorts non-decreasingly by time of availability

update_packages(clock)[source]

Parses through packages_time and adds instance of Package to available_packages dictionary if clock is greater than or equal to time of availability of Package, then removes that Package from packages_time

Parameters

clockdatetime.timedelta

time to update packages by

when_next_package()[source]

Returns time in datetime.timedelta of next available package

will_have_available_packages(clock)[source]

Checks whether Station will have any packages in available_packages at given time

Parameters

clockdatetime.timedelta

time to check packages availability by
